comment.author: 54612410@N05
comment._content: Outstanding shot!! You are a great northern explorer! I saw this awesome photo in ~North - close to and over th arctic polar circle around th world (Pool)~ Thank You for sharing your work with us! Have a nice day!! Please invite other contacts!
